name: Flying Cars 3D Lite
description:
Fly through the clouds with your flying car, destroying other flying cars with your powerful laser.
Feel the adrenaline dodging the flying cars at full speed.
Use the nitro to activate terminal velocity, with which you can destroy more enemy cars.
Descend to ground to admire the futuristic buildings, steep mountains and inhospitable fields.
Test your speed and reflexes with Flying Cars!
